preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about buying gold in a dream for a single woman Seeing an unmarried girl buying gold in a dream may indicate that her dreams that she thought were impossible will soon come true and God will force her mind. This vision may also indicate that she will marry a man with good qualities and morals. Interpretation of a dream about buying gold in a dream for a single girl. It may indicate the marriage of her sister or the daughter of one of her relatives and it will be a successful marriage, God willing. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is buying gold in a dream and she is in distress. This indicates the death of anxiety and anxiety, and deliverance from distress and anxiety. Seeing an unmarried girl buying gold in a dream and wearing it. This may mean that she will soon hear happy news about her life or future. It may also indicate that the dreamer gets good sustenance and is close to work or inheritance. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is buying gold in a dream and gives it to someone, this vision can be unpleasant and indicates failure and loss of valuables. Interpretation of a dream about buying gold in a dream in general is one of the good visions for an unmarried woman, and God Almighty is higher and more knowledgeable. You may be interested in: Seeing yourself wearing gold in a dream for a single girl Interpretation of a vision Gold in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees that she is buying gold in a dream, this vision may indicate that she will soon hear good news or that her husband will move forward in his work. But if a married woman sees that she is buying gold in a dream and has children of marriageable age, this may mean that one of her children will marry soon. However, if she is late in pregnancy, this may be an indication of the good news of her pregnancy soon, but she must be patient because God will reward her with good. Interpretation of buying gold in a dream for a married woman with young children, this may indicate the need to save money to secure her future. This vision may indicate the expansion of livelihoods and the death of worries and sorrows. Interpretation of a dream of buying gold in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman dreams that she is buying gold in a dream, this may mean that she will enjoy a lot of kindness and abundant supplies. However, if a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is buying gold and saving it, this may indicate her fear for her fetus and her concern for its future. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is buying gold, this may indicate the ease of her pregnancy and birth, and she will have a healthy, healthy child, God willing. This dream can also indicate To that she will give birth to a son and change her life for the better and happier. If a pregnant woman is suffering from the stress of pregnancy and sees herself buying gold in a dream, this may indicate that the fatigue is over and that she and her fetus are in good health. The interpretation of buying gold in a dream for a pregnant woman is one of the commendable interpretations that bring her goodness, God willing. title: The 9 most famous interpretations of seeing graduation in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing an unemployed graduate in a dream? It indicates some of the problems he faces and the difficulties he is going through. The meaning of seeing the man inside. Do you dream that university is over? A guide to traveling to earn money. What is the interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream succeeding in her studies? It indicates some difficulties and problems. What you are going through. What does it mean to see graduation with honors in a dream? Details of a baby. What is the interpretation of seeing someone graduating from university in a dream? Evidence of buying a new house and moving to it. Interpretation of a dream about graduation by Ibn Sirin. Seeing someone graduating from university in a dream is evidence of buying A new house and moving to it. Then seeing a student in a dream that he has obtained a graduation certificate, this is an indication of the dreamer’s strong desire to achieve graduation. If someone sees his diploma and has already finished his studies, this is a sign that he will get a good job. Seeing an unemployed person graduate In a dream, it indicates some problems that happen to him and the difficulties that he is going through. Interpretation of a dream about graduation for single people: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is graduating, this means that her desires will come true. Seeing success and graduation in a girl’s dream and she is happy, this indicates marriage in the near future. After that, If a girl sees that she will obtain a high school diploma, this indicates that she will get engaged soon. When seeing a girl in a dream who has been able to study, this indicates some difficulties and problems that she is going through. Graduating from studies to one of us can mean that we will hear happy news such as marriage Seeing a dream about a man’s graduation. Graduation in a man’s dream is evidence of excellence and achieving goals. Then, if one sees in a dream that he graduated from university, this is evidence of a journey to make money. When a married man sees graduation in a dream, this indicates marital happiness in which he lives with His wife. Then seeing a righteous person succeeding and graduating in a dream is evidence of Hajj and Umrah. Graduation and success in a dream is generally evidence of salvation from problems and difficulties. So seeing an inability to graduate easily is evidence of the appearance of some bad things in the life of the dreamer, so it is an unpleasant vision. Interpretation of a dream about graduation for a married woman: Graduation in a married woman’s dream is a sign of separation and divorce from her husband. If a woman sees that she has graduated from university, this indicates the success of the children. Then seeing a married woman dreams of graduating more than once is evidence that she will achieve her goals and desires. Interpretation of a dream about graduation For a pregnant woman: When a pregnant woman sees in a dream, her graduation certificate is an indication of the possibility of giving birth. Hence, seeing graduation and success in general in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the safety of the newborn and a natural birth. Graduation in a pregnant woman’s dream is an indication of the joy and happiness in which you will find yourself So, seeing graduation with distinction in a dream is evidence of the presence of a male child.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a complete tumor in a dream?

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a tumor in a dream is complete, and it is stated that a tumor occurs when swelling occurs in the body, and tumors are often in the abdomen, arm, and leg, and seeing them in a dream puts the dreamer in a state of fear and panic.. The body of men and women according to the leading scholars of interpretation and visions. If you are interested in learning the interpretation the dream. To see a tumor in a complete dream, you must follow the article and through the Trend website specialized in interpretation sciences. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of a tumor? Ibn Sirin mentioned that a tumor in a dream is one of the good visions that indicate a lot of food and money, especially if the tumor is on the hand. Also, seeing a tumor on the body in a full-sized dream is one of the dreams that indicates good conditions and improving circumstances. But if the tumor spreads in the dreamer’s body, then this is an unpleasant vision that indicates the loss of something, perhaps money or work. What is the interpretation of seeing a full-sized tumor in the dream? A dream for an ordinary woman? What is the interpretation of seeing a tumor on the hand and body in an unmarried girl’s dream? It shows kindness and a lot of food that the girl will eat in her next life. If the girl’s right leg is swollen or swollen, this indicates a long journey that may be a change in the dreamer’s life. It indicates The presence of a tumor in the girl’s right hand indicates that she will find a new job soon. If a tumor appears in the girl’s body and heals, this indicates the imminence of marriage in the next period of celibacy, and God knows best. A girl’s breasts swelling in a dream are good news, and it is one of the praiseworthy visions that portends the achievement of goals. And ambitions. What is the interpretation of seeing a tumor for a married woman? What is the interpretation of seeing a tumor on the head in a married woman’s dream, which indicates a lot of thinking about the problems and stress that she is going through in her life. But if a tumor is found on the hand of a married woman, Bishara will get A lot of money and livelihood for herself and her husband. What is the interpretation of seeing a lump in the abdomen or breast? It is an imminent harbinger of pregnancy that she will give birth to, and God knows best. Swollen legs in a dream can be indicators of a trip or work that the woman will have soon. Seeing a blow to the neck in a complete dream indicates her sincerity. And her intense love for her husband, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of the appearance of a tumor for a pregnant woman? Seeing a swelling on her body in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an easy pregnancy and good health. A tumor in general in a pregnant woman’s dream is good news for nutrition and treatment of all diseases. What is the interpretation of seeing a full molecular size in a dream? The interpretation of seeing a swollen tooth in a dream is complete evidence for the dreamer that God will give him a good successor. Likewise, if one sees his teeth swollen and affecting his face, this indicates the problems he sees in his life. Seeing a swollen tooth in a dream is full of good and useful visions and there is no need for it. To worry about that. Interpretation of a swollen whole body in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a swollen body in a dream is one of the visions that show the great strength that the dreamer will gain. Seeing a tap on his shoulder in a dream means that the dreamer will get rid of some of the burdens that hinder his life. Seeing a tumor on a man in a dream indicates It also refers to the problems and difficulties that the dreamer is going through during the period

title: Interpretation of a sheep in a dream: Seeing a sheep in a dream

preview.html: Seeing sheep, sheep, and goats is for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, whether slaughtered, eaten, bought, sold, or sold, or from the skins of a white ram, or a large black one, or a dead one. , small, and much more. Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-Nabul Interpretation of a sheep in a dream A sheep in a dream refers to an obedient male child to his parents, so anyone whose wife is pregnant and sees in a dream that someone has given him a sheep, then his wife will give birth to an obedient male child for him. He saw: that he slaughtered a sheep, or his son died, or a son of one of his family died, and this is said to be an indication of marriage. If you dream that a sheep follows you, this is a bad omen. You expect things to happen that will cause you sadness. And if you see a sheep grazing quietly, its interpretation is that you will gain... Influential friends who will do everything in their power for your good and success. If you dream that you are shearing sheep’s wool, this is a sign of a period of vitality and profit, which will flood you with projects and business. If you see flocks of sheep, this indicates joy and happiness for farmers, prosperity and success in other industries. If you see sheep that are not Useless, weak and sick, mismanaging some of your plans will make you miserable, because they will not give the expected return from them. If you eat a sheep in a dream, this means that people will hurt you and arouse your feelings. Seeing a sheep on the street or road indicates family harmony, and seeing a flock of sheep indicates Joy, happiness and success. Seeing a sheep in the field grazing quietly indicates the security that you enjoy and indicates that you will make good friends. Hearing sheep bleating indicates a baby born in your environment. Seeing a lamb being carried to the altar indicates the end of a stage or abandoning a task. Seeing a sheep in a dream means looking for trouble. A white sheep indicates In a dream, to a peaceful and healthy life. As for the black sheep, it is a disease. Seeing sheep fodder indicates travel and these benefits. Dead sheep indicate sorrows and worries. Shearing sheep wool indicates an improvement in the level of matter, as it indicates change, and seeing sheep wool indicates a good omen. Seeing a sheep is a sign of the fears that you are experiencing at home. Buying a sheep indicates the criticism you are exposed to. To see a sheep as if it is following you is a sign of a bad omen and there are worries and sorrows. An emaciated sheep in a dream shows a weak will in the face of something, which makes the reaction weak and friendly. Whoever dreams of slaughtering a sheep will defeat his enemy, and will recover if he gets sick. And whoever rides a sheep in... A dream defeats a large man. Whoever breaks the horns of a sheep or horn in a dream makes a big man angry, and whoever fights a sheep fights a large man. Whoever slaughters a sheep for food will be acquitted if he is a slave, his family will be released if he is a prisoner, he will be safe if he is afraid, and his debt will be paid if he is a debtor. He will recover if he is sick, and he will perform Hajj if he has not performed Hajj before. Whoever flogs a sheep in a dream will take his enemy’s money. He said about the evil of seeing a sheep in a dream: Whoever dreams that he slaughtered a sheep and his son dies, or the son dies on behalf of one of his relatives, and the sheep is killed without He meant. To eat it, then kill an honest and great man

title: Interpretation of sour grapes in a dream - Seeing sour grapes in a dream

preview.html: A dream about sour grapes for a single, married, pregnant, or divorced woman, for a man, either eating green grapes, or picking grapes from a seedling, or a tree, and squeezing sour green grapes Ibn Sirin. And others: Grapes are considered one of the fruits that are full of vitamins that the human body needs and contain many benefits and characteristics that make them one of the best types of fruits, but seeing them in a dream of course has good or bad consequences. This is what we will learn through our topic today, about the interpretation of seeing grapes in a dream. Interpretation of bitter grapes in a dream: Whoever sees a grape and wants to pick it, he hastens to ask for food and does not get it, as the wise man said: Whoever asks for something outside of its proper time will be punished with deprivation. Perhaps sour grapes indicate Illness and anxiety. It has been said that grapefruit is unsuitable money. Whoever sees it is interpreted as having a desirable dimension, but it is hoped that it will be fixed. Green grapefruit in the dreamer’s dream symbolizes healing, kindness, and pleasant events for the dreamer, as well as success for him, God willing. As for seeing green grapes It symbolizes money and wealth for the dreamer, and it also symbolizes the distinguished academic position of the dreamer. Green grapes in a dream may symbolize farewell, pains and sins that the dreamer commits in reality. Seeing green grapes in the summer may mean earning a living and money on the road for the dreamer. Seeing a preparation Sour grapes and turning them into juice in a dream symbolizes benefit, goodness, and the removal of worry and sadness from the dreamer. It also symbolizes that the dreamer will gain money, God willing. The gift of sour grapes from the deceased to the dreamer symbolizes his release from illness and pain. It also symbolizes the goodness of the deceased and his good condition in life. The afterlife, and God knows best. Interpretation of sour grapes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing sour grapes in a dream symbolizes goodness and abundant livelihood for the dreamer. It symbolizes sustenance with money or blessing for children. Also, seeing sour grapes and picking them symbolizes money that is on its way to the dreamer. Eating sour grapes symbolizes To a disease that afflicts the dreamer. Interpretation of bitter grapes in a dream for a single woman. Black grapes symbolize the marriage of an unmarried girl. Seeing white grapes also symbolizes marriage to a man many years older than her. As for seeing green grapefruit, it symbolizes her marriage to an influential man. Red grapes symbolize To false and fleeting emotional feelings. Interpretation of bitter grapes in a dream for a married woman: Seeing sour grapes symbolizes a woman if the sour grapes are white. Seeing black grapes also symbolizes a calm husband. As for the sour grapes that a woman sees in her dream, they symbolize disagreements and problems between her and her partner. In addition to difficult life and poverty. Green grapefruit is considered one of the praiseworthy visions because of its abundant nutrition for the wife. Interpretation of sour grapes in a dream for a pregnant woman. Dark sour grapes in a wife’s dream symbolize a newborn boy. As for light and green grapes, they symbolize a newborn baby. It also symbolizes Picking grapes indicates the nearness and ease of childbirth, God willing. In general, seeing sour grapes symbolizes the safety of the mother and her new child during

title: Interpretation of a dream about collecting date seeds for unmarried women

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a living woman married to Ibn Sirin?  The interpretation of a dream about a black snake for a married woman, the yellow snake in a dream for a married woman, and the interpretation of a dream about a green snake for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of a married woman in a dream: The appearance of a snake in a woman’s dream is one of the signs that causes confusion and fear. Unfortunately, it does not benefit her because it increases pressure in life and can represent loss in some things. Scientists agree that it is also a warning for some matters. We explain in this article the interpretation of the dream of living for a woman. Married. Interpretation of a dream about a living married woman by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about a married woman alive? The snake in a dream for a married woman has many symbols, most of which, unfortunately, are not happy, and the meaning in this dream may differ depending on the color of the snake, even if it tries to attack and bite the woman. It can be said that a snake approaching a woman may indicate a deceiver approaching her with the intention of harming her, but he is showing her honesty and kindness, so she must be aware of his misbehavior. From a psychological standpoint, psychologists have explained that the appearance of the snake is worrying because it is a sure sign of the heavy psychological burdens that it carries. He faces it and is forced to bear it every day alone without anyone to support him, despite the presence of some people. . About it. The presence of a snake for a woman in a dream is a strong sign of the evil that is likely to happen to her in her life and that it will be from someone close to her, while with the bite of the green snake some say that it is good news for pregnancy soon, God willing. As for when the black snake approaches her, it Jurists warn her of the abundance of evil that could affect her health or her family and be extremely harmful and unbearable, so she must take refuge under the care of God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about a alive married woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin claims that the entry of a snake into a married woman’s house is a symbol of harm. Close to this house, which will actually enter as this snake enters it, so it must be defended as much as possible. Her family and she protects her home by always mentioning the Qur’an. One of the signs of meeting a snake in a dream and trying to overcome it is that she is a woman characterized by combat and an important personality and always thinks about everyone’s interest with her intelligence and skills. She says that if a snake tries to harm her husband or one of her children, then she should really think about supporting that person who She saw it, because she might be in great distress and in dire need of support and help in order to pass through these harsh circumstances. It can be said that the snake coming out of the woman’s stomach is an unfavorable sign in the interpretation, because the hatred comes from her family, meaning that among them is a harmful and corrupt person who conspires evil against her. The Dream Interpretation section on the Egyptian website from Google contains many interpretations and questions from fans that you can view. Interpretation of a dream of a pregnant woman: A snake in a dream for a pregnant woman is not a blessed sign. It indicates her damaged nerves and a disturbed psyche, which always appears in a pregnant woman, as She is affected by the simplest circumstances and feels that everyone is united against her. For her soul and sadness these days. If a woman finds a lot of small snakes in her vision, the conspiracies around her are many and envy is very intense and it is one of the reasons for it being a bad factor in her life’s conditions and circumstances. While victory over

title: Interpretation of seeing flies in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Flies in their fingers have many connotations and meanings for the people who dream of them and make them want to know them a lot, and in the following article we will learn about the most important interpretations related to this topic. Let us read the following. Flies in a dream Dreaming of flies in a dream indicates that he is surrounded by many people who do not like him at all. And they want to harm him greatly. If the dreamer sees flies in his dream, this is a sign that he has many illicit relationships with women and they must be stopped immediately before they cause his death. If during his sleep one sees flies standing on his body, this is evidence of The presence of someone very close to him shows him friendliness in dealing with him even though he hates him deep down. Seeing a big fly in a dream symbolizes that he will face a problem in his life soon, but he will overcome it soon. Fly in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision in a dream of killing flies as a sign To overcome the obstacles that prevented him from achieving his goals, and the way will open for him to achieve his goal after that. If the dreamer sees flies in his dream, this is a sign of bad habits that he cannot stop doing no matter how hard he tries. When a person sees flies in his dream and kills them with slippers, this symbolizes His ability to regain his rights from a person who was severely wronged by his hand. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is chasing flies, this indicates his bad behavior in many of the situations he encounters in his life, and this causes him to fall into many problems. A fly in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried woman who Dreaming of flies is evidence that she is committing many shameful acts that anger the Lord (Glory be to Him) and she must immediately withdraw from them before they cause her death. If the dreamer sees flies during his sleep and eats them, this is a sign of his desire to follow a proper diet to avoid deterioration of his condition and maintain his body. Agile. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is unable to expel flies from the house, this is a sign that she is surrounded by inappropriate company that urges her to commit immorality and inappropriate actions. A girl who sees flies in her food in her dream symbolizes the presence of someone she knows who has hired a charlatan to do essential work. For her to spoil her peace in life. What is the interpretation of seeing flies being killed in a single woman’s dream? Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream because she is killing flies symbolizes her ability to overcome many things that she was very upset about and feel very comfortable afterwards. If the dreamer sees during His dream is that she is killing flies, then this is a sign of her desire to break the bad habits that she has been doing for a long time and repent of them once and for all. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is killing flies and getting engaged, then this expresses many arguments taking place with her fiancé and her desire to separate from him because she does not You feel comfortable. Seeing a girl killing flies in her dream shows her strong personality that allows her to face all the problems she faces in her life without needing any help from others. Expelling flies in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman

title: Interpretation of broken teeth in a dream - seeing broken teeth in a dream

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of a dream about broken teeth by Ibn Sirin and seeing a pregnant woman’s front teeth broken. Interpretation of broken teeth in a dream. Interpretation of broken teeth in a dream. Whoever sees that his teeth are broken, one of his relatives or friends has died, and it may be an indication of illness and death from that disease. Teeth on the right side indicate males. And what is on the left indicates females in all people, and the teeth on the right side indicate older men and women. The teeth on the left side indicate among the young, the slopes of the teeth show boys, the canines show their type, and the molars show the old among them. In secret, fangs indicate what is not visible to most people, what a person prefers in terms of visible things, and what he does with words and speech. Osteoclast responseWhoever sees his fall will be saved from all harm and evil. The disease is caused by an abundance of yellow bile, which is called jaundice, and if he sees his teeth made of glass or wood, this indicates that death will overcome him, and if he sees them made of silver, it is a sign of harm and loss. From the reason for the talk that he gains in his money. Teeth indicate race, relatives and distant ones. What is next to the eyes is male, and what is behind the forehead is female. He forcefully announces the fine of his money or the uprooting of some of his relatives. Interpretation of tooth decay in a dream. Whoever sees himself with fragments, this is evidence that the people of the household are exposed to anything, whether livelihood, harm, or calamity, as the upper jaw means the family and loved ones associated with the dreamer. The possibility of interpreting the dream may vary depending on The individual's condition. If a person experiences the loss of a tooth in the upper jaw, this may be a sign of the return of food from God Almighty to the people of the household. If a person sees that the teeth in the mouth are sagging, this is evidence that the one who sees the dream will pay him some debts. Seeing a broken tooth for a manA man sees He himself is exposed to dental problems and suffers from the loss, fracture, and fragmentation of the front teeth. This may be a sign that the person is exposed to the loss of a relative or his close family. In the event that blood is seen to come out accompanying the extraction of teeth, this means that the person is exposed to loss and major failure in one of the things and projects he is involved in. Teeth falling out in a dream. Teeth falling out in a dream is a sign of the long life of the person who sees the dream. Dream of broken front teeth. Seeing the front teeth broken and falling out is evidence that the person is suffering from debt and has not been able to repay this debt. Seeing a broken tooth for a married woman when one sees that he is suffering. From a broken tooth in his dream, it means that God is warning that person that he is suffering from the illness of his wife or one of his children. If a married woman sees that her upper teeth are falling out, this is a clear sign that she will give birth to a male child or that her husband will be able to earn a lot of money. If the teeth fall to the ground, this is evidence of the death of the husband or one of the children. And whoever sees herself falling out of her teeth one after the other in her lap, it may be evidence that she is benefiting from her father, son, or husband as much as possible, and is exposed to many offspring and children.

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin and seeing gold in a dream is one of the signs of goodness that a person dreams of, as seeing gold in a dream indicates that the seer will get many good things, such as: gold in a dream is a sign of wealth for the poor, and it is also considered one of the indicators that suggest that gold indicates the good and haste that the pioneer will achieve, so we will work together to clarify what is the interpretation of the dream of gold for a single woman Interpretation of the dream of gold for a pregnant woman as well as the interpretation of a gift of gold in a dream and much more All this through this article. Interpretation of a dream of seeing yourself buying gold in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq explained the general view of gold in a dream for a number of interpretations that differ in their meanings according to who sees the gold and the type of industry in the dream. Seeing yourself selling gold in a dream indicates the presence of problems and disputes and it is said that it cuts off relations with those close to you or those who lose money and work with those who see it. Seeing a house plated with gold in a dream means that there are fires in that house and the family is struggling and God knows best. Seeing the eyes, which have turned into gold in a dream, indicates the occurrence of a disease, and it is said that he has lost sight for the one who sees it, and God knows best. Whoever sees melting Gold in dreams symbolizes sadness, distress, quarrel, or enmity with someone, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about buying gold in a dream for a single girl A single woman who dreams of seeing large amounts of gold. This dream indicates that the dreamer will have many good things in her life. And whoever sees in her dream that she is wearing a gold ring or chain, this dream indicates that the single woman. Proposes to her and the man will keep her. Seeing gold in a dream generally indicates goodness and wealth after poverty or health after illness and fatigue. And gold in a dream is one of the visions of praise that a person sees in his dream. Likewise, whoever sees in her dream that she is giving someone a gift of gold. This dream indicates that God Almighty will give her a lot of good and will give it soon. And gold in his dream indicates a great increase and value in society, and it will become much better than before. Interpretation of a dream about buying gold in a dream for a married woman A married woman sees in her dream that she sees that she is giving a gift of gold to someone, and this dream indicates that the dreamer will get many good things and live. And that this married woman will live a very happy married life. Seeing gold In a married woman’s dream, it indicates that God Almighty will make her live a happy life full of stability and joy. Gold in a dream reflects changing circumstances, that is, whoever sees in his dream that he sees a lot of gold. This dream symbolizes that her life and situation will change for the better soon. A married woman sees in her dream that she is offering a piece of gold to one of them, and this dream indicates that she will occupy a position in one of her professions. This position is considered the presidency of one of the companies in which he works. Seeing gold in general is a good sign in my opinion and does not harm in any way. Interpretation of buying gold in a dream
